data.text: @MattVanDeventer I don’t know that there was anything sudden about it, the movie tips its cap that Cavill is evil almost immediately. The twist is in the reveal, not in the twist itself.
@JustinMoris I hope this movie has more story than fury road.
@Ryanb____ I just didn’t think there was anything strange about his quote at all and everyone is dunking on him for being a literal alien.

Tom Cruise: “I love movies. I love going to them, it was a transformative experience for me as a kid, the way they made me feel. The thrill of watching them with a crowd. I try to recreate that feeling with every movie I make. I love it.”
Twitter: GET A LOAD OF THIS FRIGGIN FREAK
@JustinMoris Couldn't believe how GOOD it was to follow Rogue Nation. Thought they'd certainly PEAKED. The Opera scene in RN is still tops though.

@JustinMoris @Cazzy @schneidz @schaaptop @SpicyTunaRo @j0shc Action was great and very well executed. Should've cut out 1/2 the dialogue and 2/3 of the triple crosses. Would've preferred to see Henry Cavill as the good agent following orders and not the sudden mustache twirling bad guy.
@MarlinTheMan @JustinMoris @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo Goddamnit I HATE when my actual agenda is exposed!!!
@JustinMoris @j0shc @schneidz @schaaptop @SpicyTunaRo https://t.co/mjOavksyZv
@JustinMoris @Cazzy @schneidz @schaaptop @SpicyTunaRo In one tweet, you just made me love religion

@j0shc @Cazzy @schneidz @schaaptop @SpicyTunaRo The villains are accelerationist atheists looking to nuke every holy city on earth, so it’s only right that Ethan fight them as a champion of organized religion.
@JustinMoris @Cazzy @schneidz @schaaptop @SpicyTunaRo I can’t wait to see it, even if the rumors of Ethan Hunt becoming Greek Orthodox have me a little concerned
@Cazzy @schneidz @schaaptop @SpicyTunaRo @j0shc Let’s get back to the matter at hand here: that Mission: Impossible Fallout friggin rips and is one of the great action movies of all time

@schneidz @schaaptop @SpicyTunaRo @j0shc @JustinMoris I dont boycott already rich people because it's a) hard to screen everyone and b) me boycotting them will not make them less rich. It's definitely case by case but I'm all about picking your battles

@schaaptop @SpicyTunaRo @j0shc @Cazzy @JustinMoris I am quite split on this, cuz like Josh, I love 99% of his movies, & think he is an incredible actor. But I also fully get where Ro is coming from & absolutely loath Scientology. But as much as hate scientology, I don't think I have it in me to boycott Tom Cruise films cuz of it.
@JustinMoris @SpicyTunaRo @j0shc @Cazzy this got a legit LOL from me!
@schaaptop @SpicyTunaRo @j0shc @Cazzy Think of how great he has to be at acting to convincingly portray a relatable human being in every movie
@JustinMoris @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo also, look at how bad twitter is, we started out agreeing about Tom Cruise ruling, to discussing if Scientology or Islam causes more harm in like 5 minutes haahah
@JustinMoris @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo I'd love to discuss the last point in person, but lets drop it here
@j0shc @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo Because it literally only exists to be a grift and do harm. There is no other purpose than to defraud and destroy people. It is not a religion.
@JustinMoris @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo yeah, I don't want to demean your personal experience, I'm just not sure how you can say Scientology is actively doing more harm.

@j0shc @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo I think your concept of Islam here is... not quite right. I have firsthand experience watching Scientology bankrupt people and intentionally tear families apart. I’ll leave it at that.
@Cazzy @JustinMoris @SpicyTunaRo I thought we were done Cazzy!
@JustinMoris @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo I'm genuinely not sure wha you're hittin home at. How is scientology "easily worse" than any actual religion?
@bookofloob @JustinMoris @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo I wont
@JustinMoris @SpicyTunaRo @Cazzy Yeah, there are many people I give passes to for their beliefs, I don't think that separates me from others
@j0shc @JustinMoris @SpicyTunaRo Oooooooooof
@j0shc @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo Woof
@SpicyTunaRo @j0shc @Cazzy Beck is a Scientologist and I still listen to his music. Part of my family that lives in California are Scientologists and I still love them.
@SpicyTunaRo @j0shc @Cazzy @JustinMoris you can hate Tom Cruise and everything he's about but still enjoy his movies and identify that he is a tremendous actor.

@j0shc @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo If you wanna argue about the wars fought in their names, or the casual cruelty of the religious right for those who fall outside their idea of morality, sure. But Scientology actively, intentionally ruins people’s lives all the time. It is easily worse than any actual religion.
@j0shc @SpicyTunaRo @JustinMoris I'm not saying there aren't but idk if they're as large or public as Scientology is, or as money hungry instead of power
@Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo @JustinMoris No, I for sure agree with that, but if you don't think there's modern day Christian or Islamic cults, boy howdy I've got some documentaries you might dig
@j0shc @JustinMoris @SpicyTunaRo I think calling religion worthless is pretty firm and extreme but we could do this all day so yeah lets not

@j0shc @SpicyTunaRo @JustinMoris It's not about historical context, scientology started in the 50s and actively works to control members lives and take their money. its not the same as people who go to church on sundays
@JustinMoris @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo No doubt about it. I am not here to argue Scientology having any merit, only that it’s just as worthless as every other religion

@j0shc @Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo It’s an abusive cult that steals people’s life savings and attracts celebrities by telling them they were chosen for their success and didn’t just luck into good fortune. Cruise basically bought his way into being anointed their Jesus.
@SpicyTunaRo @JustinMoris I agree, I think it's very dumb, and would never ever take part in it
@j0shc @JustinMoris Haha fair.
@JustinMoris @FergieWrestler I dig War of the Worlds for sure!
@FergieWrestler @JustinMoris or for sure! But so are so many wrestlers, musicians, actors that I like
@j0shc @FergieWrestler War of the Worlds very underrated too

@Cazzy @SpicyTunaRo @JustinMoris I think you'd probably have a hard time arguing that Scientology has done more harm than Christianity, but this is the version of twitter i try to not get to far into hahaha
@j0shc @JustinMoris He's such a fucking knob personally though lol.
@j0shc @SpicyTunaRo @JustinMoris 100%, Scientology is a full on abusive cult
@SpicyTunaRo @JustinMoris Is Scientology more harmful than other religions?
@FergieWrestler @JustinMoris Edge of Tomorrow, Top Gun, Collateral, Tropic Thunder, all the Mission Impossibles, Vanilla Sky, The Last Samurai
@SpicyTunaRo @JustinMoris @j0shc gotta separate the art from the weirdo, Ro
@j0shc @JustinMoris Yuck. That  concussion has done tremendous damage lol 😂

@SpicyTunaRo @JustinMoris I don't care at all that he's a scientologist, as I dont care if any actors are buddhist or greek orthodox or literally any silly religion. I only know that besides The Mummy, I've liked damn near every movie he's been in for like 15 years
@SpicyTunaRo @j0shc If you like action movies, he’s kinda the king.
@JustinMoris Tom Cruise is the best, thats a fact
